answers.answer: I was totally deficient in B1 & B5.  I had your symptoms.  Get your levles rechecked and consider that you do not absorb them properly.  So, taking very large doses may be what you need, like I do.  As long as they are water soluable, large doses are ok.  You will pee out what you don't use.Check all your vitamin levels.  Can be real expensive, but is the only way to know what you are low in.  I was also very low in Potassium & Magnesium.  Which can cause what you are experiencing.Good luck.Susan
